TextView.android:text: MyFoves individuals to use their mobile phones to take photos of their feet. A foot check feature extracts the DFU size from the photo and shows the healing progress. MyFootCare visualizes personal goals and provides reminders to enact regular self-care. App concept and interaction design: Bernd Ploderer, Ross Brown, Peter Lazzarini, Jaap van Netten Visual design: Clare Villalba Software development: Luke Molloy Additional podiatry expertise: Damien Clark, Jason Warnock The development has been supported by Queensland University of Technology (QUT) and The Prince Charles Hospital Foundation. http://www.myfootcare.org/The content of MyFootCare is provided solely for educational and informational purposes and is not intended as medical advice. It should not be considered a substitute for the advice of medical practitioners or other qualified healthcare professionals. If users require medical advice, they should consult appropriately qualified healthcare professionals. MyFootCare content is provided without any representations or warranties, express or implied, as to its accuracy, currency or completeness. To the fullest extent permissible at law, Queensland University of Technology, its employees and affiliates exclude all liability for loss or damage caused by or arising out of any reliance on the information contained in this mobile phone application.
